title: Web Development Fundamentals
short_description: Learn the basics of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: JavaScript Programming
short_description: Master JavaScript programming for dynamic web applications.

title: Backend Development with Node.js
short_description: Build server-side applications using Node.js and Express.

short_description: Learn React to create interactive and dynamic user interfaces.

title: Web Security and Authentication
short_description: Explore security practices and implement authentication in web applications.

title: Database Management for Web Apps
short_description: Learn database design and management for web applications.

title: Web Development Project Management
short_description: Manage web development projects effectively from start to finish.

title: Web Accessibility and Inclusive Design
short_description: Learn to create web experiences accessible to all users.

title: Progressive Web App Development
short_description: Build progressive web apps (PWAs) for enhanced user experiences.
